sentences.sentence: When I told them I didn't use any particular technique to draw women into my orbit, they scoffed disbelievingly.
sentences.translation: 当我回答他们我没有用任何特别的技巧来“猎取”女性时，他们一脸怀疑地嘲笑了我。

sentences.sentence: Twenty years after Germans crowded disbelievingly through the wall, it is a fading scar in the capital of a united Germany.
sentences.translation: 这道墙被德国民众难以置信的打通二十年之后，它是统一的德国首都的一道消退中的伤疤。
